channel.description: Recent content in resources on Deploy Data Science

item.title: Resources
item.description: Awesome List of Data Science Resources Data Engineering Playlist of Awesome Data Engineering Videos Machine Learning API Flask https://github.com/exleym/Flask-Filter Filtering library directly on top of flask Similar libs: https://github.com/juliotrigo/sqlalchemy-filters https://github.com/gorilla-co/odata-query https://github.com/rochacbruno/dynaconf/ Configuration management for Flask in Production environments DevOps Nginx https://github.com/digitalocean/nginxconfig.io NGINX config generator on steroids. Documentation docusaurus https://docusaurus.io/ APIs Hasura - Hasura gives you instant GraphQL & REST APIs on new & existing data sources.
